author: whaughton
title: Yaya Toure insists he could play for Manchester City for another FIVE years… even though no new deal is on the cards
text:
EFL Yaya the mentor Yaya Toure insists he could play for Manchester City for another FIVE years… even though no new deal is on the cards 
Edihad midfielder, 33, is relishing older statesman role at the club as he gives advice to starlets Gabriel Jesus and Leroy Sane by Warren Haughton
